Centrifuge
==========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Centrifuge installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Centrifuge, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Centrifuge/1.0.4-beta-gompi-2020a
```
